    • Method Detail

      • findCustomer

        public static Customer findCustomer(java.lang.String column,
                    java.lang.String value)
                             throws java.sql.SQLException
        Searches for the specified value in the database using the specified column.
        Parameters:
        column - The column to search in the database.
        Use the string constants to specify the column (i.e., CustomerAccess.CUSTOMER_ID or CustomerAccess.FIRST_NAME).
        value - The string to search the database for.
        Returns:
        A Customer object representing the customer found in the database.
        Throws:
        java.sql.SQLException - if the specified customer was not found in the database.
